name: createReactionAction
title: Reaction Action Builder
oneLiner: Reactive state manager for emoji reactions on Nostr events with NIP-30 custom emoji support

parameters.name: event
parameters.description: The event to track reactions for

parameters.name: delayed
parameters.description: Optional delay in seconds before publishing reactions (for cancellable reactions)

returns.name: all
returns.description: Array of all reactions grouped by emoji, sorted by count descending

returns.name: totalCount
returns.description: Total count of all reactions across all emojis

returns.name: get
returns.description: Get reaction data for a specific emoji

returns.name: react
returns.description: Toggle reaction for given emoji or custom emoji data. Publishes if not reacted, deletes if already reacted, or cancels if pending
